Interpretation (planets):
 Jupiter: Any aspect with this planet is good / benefitial.
 Saturn: 90° and 180° aspects of this planet are bad/destructive. Other aspects are mixed, but mostly good / benficial.
 Uranus: The planet of surprise. Any aspect might be good or bad.
 Neptune: An aspect could have positive and/or negative elements.
 Pluto: 90° and 180° aspects of this planet are bad/destructive. Other aspects are mixed, but mostly good / benficial.

 
 Interpretation (aspects):
 * marks major aspects, where either:
 1) Both plants are in the same house, or
 2) One of the planets is in a house which is ruled by the other planet, or
 3) The natal and transiting planet is the same one, so both rule the same house
 
 0° (conjunction): This aspect might be hard or soft, depending on the planet
 30°, 330° (Semi-sextile): A soft/harmonious angle. No change required
 60°, 300° (*, sextile): A soft/harmonious angle. No change required
 90°, 270° (□, square): A hard angle. Change is required
 120°, 240° (∆, trine): A soft/harmonious angle. No change required
 150°, 210° (Quincunx): A soft but somewhat unpredictable angle. No change required.
 180° (/, oposition): A hard angle. Expect change
 

 Interpretation (houses): Below are the main controlling areas of each house. These are the areas of life which are affected by a transiting aspect
 1: Self / Ego
 2: Property / Money
 3: Intelligence / Communications
 4. Home / Family
 5. Pleasure / Love / Creativity
 6. Health / Work
 7. Marriage / Partnerships
 8. Deaths And Rebirth / Joint Property
 9. Long Distance Travels / Knowledge / Experience
 10. Social Status / Career
 11. Friendship
 12. Seclusion
